mapper.insert:
select faq_seq.nextval from dual
insert into faq(faq_no, category, title, content, regdate) values(#{faqNo}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum as RNUM, LIST_ALL.* from (select faq_no, category, title, content, regdate from faq
where category = '회원가입 및 탈퇴' or category = '회원정보관리' or category='이력서 관리 및 활용' or category='온라인지원' or category='알바토크' or category='기타 문의'
where category = '회원가입 및 탈퇴' or category = '기업정보관리' or category='이력서 검색 및 열람' or category='유료서비스/결제오류' or category='세금계산서' or category='기타 문의'
order by category desc) LIST_ALL )
where RNUM> #{firstRecordIndex} and RNUM<= #{firstRecordIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
